data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Chhatarpur words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chhatarpur, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Chhatarpur, Madhya Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, 1,762,400 people live in the county of Chhatarpur. Please, give them 352 new simple churches this year.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Chhatarpur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Saur people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Saur people know you.
Over 97.69 percent of the people of Chhatarpur are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Chhatarpur.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Chhatarpur access to a Bible in their own language.
